item.title: [dp专题000]uva 10328 Coin Toss (java 大数+dp)（Unsolved）
item.description: 题目链接 题意：问长度为n，每个位置由且仅有‘H’和'T'组成的序列中，至少有连续k个‘H’出现的方案数。 思路：不会做，参考了题解 不过没有完全

item.title: BZOJ 1655: [Usaco2006 Jan] Dollar Dayz 奶牛商店 (母函数，高精度)
item.description: 1655: [Usaco2006 Jan] Dollar Dayz 奶牛商店 Time Limit: 5 Sec Memory Limit: 64 MB Submit: 353 Solved: 190 [Submit][Status][Discuss] Description Farmer John goes to Dollar Days at The Cow Store and discovers an unlimited number of tools on sale. During his first visit, the tools are selling variously for $1, $2, and $3. Farmer John has exactly $5 to spend. He can buy 5 tools at $1
